vocabulary.example: The city center was densely populated with skyscrapers.

vocabulary.definition: a factual written account of important or historical events in the order of their occurrence
vocabulary.example: The book provides a chronicle of the ancient civilization's rise and fall.

vocabulary.definition: not existing naturally; created by human intervention
vocabulary.example: The lake was artificially created by damming the river.

vocabulary.definition: unnecessary extra features or decorative details
vocabulary.example: The dress was elegant with just the right amount of frill on the sleeves.

vocabulary.definition: to assign or deliver something/someone to a particular place or destiny
vocabulary.example: The package was consigned to the wrong address.

vocabulary.definition: to prevent a video or content from earning revenue through advertising
vocabulary.example: The controversial video was demonetized due to its sensitive subject matter.
